Dining at The Village

Discover the Flavours of The Village

Whether it’s an early breakfast, a long brunch with friends, a casual lunch, or dinner to end the day, dining at The Village is always a treat.

From fresh, wholesome bites to indulgent comfort food, our range of eateries has something to suit every taste and craving.

Discover the real taste of freshness when you visit:

3 Black Bears Pizza
At 3 Black Bears, their pizzas are made fresh to order, loaded with top-quality ingredients, and crafted with love by true pizza lovers.
Discover More
8848 Momo House
Bring everyone together over a mouthwatering Oriental Fusion feast, starring tender, plump Nepalese momos bursting with authentic and creative fillings!
Discover More
Baskin-Robbins
Indulge in the world-famous Baskin-Robbins experience, where every scoop is made to bring a smile. From creamy ice creams and decadent sundaes to irresistible shakes and custom ice cream cakes, there’s a flavour for every mood.
Discover More
Big Buns Burgers, Ribs & Shakes
Breakfast to dessert – they’ve got it all: juicy burgers, fall-off-the-bone ribs, loaded shakes & epic pancakes. Vegan? Gluten-free? There’s something for everyone, all day, every day.
Discover More
Dosa Hut
Craving real Indian flavours? Dosa Hut has been serving Australia’s best dosas, biryanis, street food and more for over a decade. From 99 dosas to Indo-Chinese delights, every dish is crafted with the finest ingredients and served with care.
Discover More
Dough Ma
Fresh, fluffy & filled to perfection. Made fresh daily on-site, Dough Ma serves up some of Brisbane’s fluffiest, most cream-filled doughnuts. Keep an eye out – special flavours drop regularly!
Discover More
Little Green Cafe & Catering
Fresh food, great coffee, big personality! Serving up delicious fresh bites, top-notch service, and coffees with character.
Discover More
Noodle Box
Experience the vibrant flavours of South-East Asia, all in one box. Fresh, made-to-order and packed with authentic wok-fired magic – your ticket to Asia’s street markets, one delicious bite at a time.
Cravey Kebab Grill
Cravey Kebab Grill serves up fresh, flavour-packed kebabs made to order. From juicy grilled meats to vibrant salads and warm wraps, it’s your go-to spot for tasty, satisfying eats on the go.
Discover More
Subway
Fresh subs, wraps, and salads made just how you like them. With a wide range of ingredients and toppings, every meal is packed with bold, satisfying flavours.
Discover More
Sushi Yogi
Serving delicious sushi and Japanese favourites made fresh daily. Whether you’re after a quick bite or a flavour-packed feast, Sushi Yogi is your go-to for authentic Japanese goodness.
Discover More
Village Bakehouse
A family-owned bakery serving award-winning pies, cakes, pastries, paninis, wraps, and burgers. Craving something different? Enjoy their delicious Vietnamese favourites, including Banh Mi, noodle bowls, rice paper rolls, and more!
Discover More

Welcome Here

We acknowledge and respect the traditional lands and cultures of the Yuggera people, the Traditional Owners and Custodians of the Country on which The Village Upper Mount Gravatt resides, and pay our respects to Elders past and present. We recognise First Nations peoples' longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
